      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_ba4c7a0a79436fddbb32662ee9306b4f93f4b1fd</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_ba4c7a0a79436fddbb32662ee9306b4f93f4b1fd</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A conducting wire moving in a magnetic field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Leitleitung, die in ein magnetisches bewegt, 
fangen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un fil de conduite se déplaçant un champ 
magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um fio conduzindo que move-se em um campo 
magnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un legare di condotta che si muove in un campo 
magnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα καλώδιο διεύθυνσης που κινείται σε ένα μαγνητικό
πεδίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un alambre que conduce que se mueve en un campo 
magnético</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a moving wire cutting across the magnetic flux with its length and velocity indicated. This can be used in an exercise to calculate the e.m.f. induced across the ends of the wire as it travels through the field at some distance.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">induced e.m.f.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">length</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic flux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen beweglichen Leitung 
Ausschnitt über dem magnetischen Fluß mit seiner angezeigten Länge 
und Geschwindigkeit. Dieses kann in einer Übung verwendet 
werden, um das e.m.f. zu errechnen, das über den Enden der Leitung 
verursacht wird, während es durch auffangene in irgendeinem 
Abstand reist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un découpage mobile de 
fil à travers le flux magnétique avec sa longueur et vitesse 
indiquées. Ceci peut être employé dans un exercice pour 
calculer l'e.m.f. induit à travers les extrémités du fil pendant 
qu'il voyage par la zone à une certaine distance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um corte movente do fio 
através do fluxo magnético com seus comprimento e velocidade 
indicados. Isto pode ser usado em um exercício calcular o 
e.m.f. induzido através das extremidades do fio enquanto viaja 
através do campo em alguma distância.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un taglio commovente 
del legare attraverso il cambiamento continuo magnetico con la 
relative lunghezza e velocità indicate. Ciò può essere usata 
in un'esercitazione per calcolare il e.m.f. indotto attraverso le 
estremità del legare mentre attraversa through il campo ad una certa 
distanza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κινούμενη κοπή καλωδίων 
πέρα από το μαγνητικό συλλίπασμα με το μήκος και την ταχύτητά 
της που υποδεικνύονται. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια
άσκηση για να υπολογίσει το e.m.f. που προκαλείται στις άκρες 
του καλωδίου καθώς ταξιδεύει μέσω του πεδίου σε κάποια 
απόσταση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un corte móvil del 
alambre a través del flux magnético con su longitud y velocidad 
indicadas. Esto se puede utilizar en un ejercicio para calcular 
el e.m.f. inducido a través de los extremos del alambre mientras que 
viaja a través del campo en una cierta distancia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">verursachtes e.m.f.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Länge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetischer Fluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">e.m.f induit.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">longueur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">flux magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vitesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">distância</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">e.m.f induzido.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comprimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fluxo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">velocidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">distanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">e.m.f indotto.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lunghezza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamento continuo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">velocità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απόσταση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προκληθέν e.m.f.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μήκος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητική ροή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταχύτητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">distancia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">e.m.f inducido.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">longitud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">flux magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">velocidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
